tags.name: form-builder
tags.description: Form Builder using Drag'n'Drop written in LitElement

attributes.name: isDragOverFormPanelFromControlPanel
attributes.description: Property to determine whether drag over is being done over form panel using item from control panel

attributes.name: selectedIndex
attributes.description: Index of the selected item from control panel

attributes.name: selectedInFormIndex
attributes.description: Index of the selected item from form panel

attributes.name: inFormHoveredOverItemIndex
attributes.description: Applicable only to reordering inside the form panel. Property to determine index of hovered over control

attributes.name: formItemList
attributes.description: List of controls on the form.

attributes.name: controlList
attributes.description: List of available controls to be dragged onto form.

attributes.name: isDndInsideForm
attributes.description: Property to determine whether Drag'n'Drop is being done from controls panel to form panel, or just inside form panel

attributes.name: isFromTopToBottom
attributes.description: Applicable only to reordering inside the form panel. Property to determine whether drag'n'drop performed from top to bottom or vice versa
